DOC.brief_summary: Does duration cardiopulmonary bypass , aortic cross clamp affect post operative pulmonary function .
DOC.brief_title: Aortic Cross Clamping Time , Postoperative Respiratory Function
DOC.detailed_description: Cardiac surgery usually do cardiopulmonary bypass . As blood contact artificial tube circuit , release mediator affect pulmonary function . Of doubt duration cardiopulmonary bypass , cross clamping time , affect spell mediator . Follow pulmonary function , arterial blood gas mandatory group patient .
DOC.criteria: adult patient elective open heart surgery Patients myocardial ischemia previous infarction low ejection fraction < 30 % history AF implant pacemaker uncontrolled hypertension renal impairment ( creatinine > 1.8 mg/dl ) hepatic dysfunction insulin dependent diabetes chronic pulmonary disease
